# vngcloud_vdb_subnet (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "vngcloud_vdb_subnet" "subnet" {
    network_id = "net-0e60e02c-ca47-4654-9d7c-89ecc1ca572b"
    name = "MySubnet"
}
```
